name: !so
description: Shout out to the target viewer, diisplaying stream link and last played game

name: !props
description: Give love to the target, displays the twitch URL (for shoutouts to non-streamers who are awesome

name: !back
description: Lets the stream know that Otto will be right back, he is stretching

name: !mafia
description: Otto's shoutout to the Twitch Mafia, displays twitch links
Disclaimer that Otto is having a smoke

name: !addcommand
description: Add a command directly from chat

name: !editcommand
description: Edit a command directly from chat

name: !removecommand
description: Remove a command directly from chat

name: !enable
description: Enable/disable a command directly from chat

name: !death
description: Sets the death count to a specific number
